author: Ginnyharry4ever
title: The Lion Guard
text: (Undo revision 2541453 by Lion King Fanatic ( talk )) Line 47: *'''[[Beshte]]''' ([[Dusan Brown]]) - a hippopotamus who is part of the Lion Guard. He is the strongest member of the Lion Guard. *'''[[Beshte]]''' ([[Dusan Brown]]) - a hippopotamus who is part of the Lion Guard. He is the strongest member of the Lion Guard. *'''[[Ono]]''' ([[Atticus Shaffer]]) - an egret who is part of the Lion Guard. He is the Lion Guard's keenest of sight. *'''[[Ono]]''' ([[Atticus Shaffer]]) - an egret who is part of the Lion Guard. He is the Lion Guard's keenest of sight. *'''[[Mzingo]]''' ([[Greg Ellis|Johnny Rees]]) - a Rüppell's griffon vulture and Janja's majordomo. *'''[[Zuri]]''' ([[Madison Pettis]]) - a female lioness cub and friend of Kiara. *'''[[Zuri]]''' ([[Madison Pettis]]) - a female lioness cub and friend of Kiara. *'''[[Tiifu]]''' ([[Sarah Hyland]]) - another female lioness cub and friend of Kiara. *'''[[Tiifu]]''' ([[Sarah Hyland]]) - another female lioness cub and friend of Kiara. + *'''[[Janja]]''' ([[Andrew Kishino]]) - The leader of his clan. He and his hyenas are descended from Scar's Hyena Clan. *'''[[Cheezi]]''' (Vargus Mason) - One of Janja's minions. *'''[[Chungu]]''' (Kevin Schon) - One of Janja's minions. *'''[[Makuu]]''' ([[Blair Underwood]]) - The leader of the crocodiles. *'''[[Pua (The Lion Guard)|Pua]]''' ([[Gerald C. Rivers]]) - a crocodile who is the former leader of the crocodiles. *'''[[Pua (The Lion Guard)|Pua]]''' ([[Gerald C. Rivers]]) - a crocodile who is the former leader of the crocodiles. *'''[[Basi]]''' ([[Kevin Michael Richardson]]) - Beshte's father who is the leader of the hippos. *'''[[Basi]]''' ([[Kevin Michael Richardson]]) - Beshte's father who is the leader of the hippos. *'''[[Reirei]]''' ([[Ana Gasteyer]]) - a clever and scheming jackal who wreaks havoc in the Pride Lands. *'''[[Jasiri]]''' ([[Maia Mitchell]]) - a friendly and kindhearted spotted hyena that is allies with Kion. *'''[[Jasiri]]''' ([[Maia Mitchell]]) - a friendly and kindhearted spotted hyena that is allies with Kion. *'''[[Ushari]]''' (Christian Slater) - a snake that holds an unexplained dislike for Bunga. *'''[[Ushari]]''' (Christian Slater) - a snake that holds an unexplained dislike for Bunga. + *'''[[Kovu]]''' ([[Jason Marsden]])<ref name="TLG">[http://variety.com/2015/tv/news/the-lion-guard-disney-premiere-january-1201657485/ Disney’s ‘Lion King’ Revival Series ‘The Lion Guard’ to Premiere in January]</ref> - [[Scar]]'s chosen heir and Nuka and Vitani's younger brother. *'''[[Nuka]]''' ([[Andy Dick]])<ref name="TLG" /> - Kovu and Vitani's older brother. *'''[[Vitani]]''' ([[Lacey Chabert]])<ref name="TLG" /> - Nuka's younger sister and Kovu's older sister. *'''[[Ma Tembo]]''' (Lynette Dupree) - An elephant that is close to Simba's family. *'''[[Ma Tembo]]''' (Lynette Dupree) - An elephant that is close to Simba's family. *'''[[Mbuni]]''' ([[Kari Wahlgren]]) - A kindhearted ostrich. *'''[[Mbuni]]''' ([[Kari Wahlgren]]) - A kindhearted ostrich. He befriends Beshte and becomes a resident of the Pride Lands. *'''[[Vuruga Vuruga]]''' (Virginia Watson) - Vuruga Vuruga is a cape buffalo. She's close to the monarchy. *'''[[Vuruga Vuruga]]''' (Virginia Watson) - Vuruga Vuruga is a cape buffalo. She's close to the monarchy. −
